case.name: Restom v Battenberg, in the matter of Battenberg (with Corrigendum dated 22 May 2006) [2006] FCA 524 (4 April 2006)

citphrases.citphrase: application for extension of time nunc pro tunc within which to apply for a review of a registrar's decision
